info.description: E-commerce API with products, cart, and orders management
info.title: Go AI Store API

post.description: Get a new access token using refresh token

get.description: Get the authenticated user's shopping cart

delete.description: Remove all items from the cart

post.description: Add a product to the user's cart

put.description: Update the quantity of an item in the cart

delete.description: Remove a specific item from the cart

get.description: Get all orders for the authenticated user with pagination

post.description: Creates a new order from the user's cart. Supports idempotency via X-Idempotency-Key header.

parameters.description: Idempotency key to prevent duplicate orders
parameters.name: X-Idempotency-Key

get.description: Get a single order by ID. Users can only access their own orders unless admin.

post.description: Cancel a pending order. Only pending orders can be cancelled.

put.description: Update the status of an order. Admin only.

parameters.description: New status (pending, confirmed, shipped, delivered, cancelled)
parameters.name: request

get.description: Get a single product by ID

post.description: Upload an image for a product

BearerAuth.description: Enter your bearer token in the format: Bearer {token}
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
